{{Infobox dungeon |name = Pokemon Mansion |image = [[File:Pokemon Mansion.png|350px]] |caption = An overhead map of the Pokemon Mansion. |tokens = 1,500 |location = West of Cinnabar Island }} '''Pokemon Mansion''' is a dungeon in [[Kanto]].
==Details==
===Dungeon Stats===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Normal || 17,760 |- | Boss || 88,800 |}
===Pokémon===
* Growlithe * Vulpix * Grimer * Muk * Koffing * Weezing * Magmar (boss)
===Items===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | [[X Attack|xAttack]] || 40% |- | [[XClick|xClick]] || 40% |- | [[Token Collector]] || 20% |}
